description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe web game frontend, including theme management and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application with centering and background color management.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component for the app styled with background color and flexible alignment.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo of the application with specified height and animation options.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styled link component with color transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with styling for hover and active states.
